teaser: Asian markets are down, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, August 20, 2013
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Asian markets are down today, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it, dropping 5 percent two days in a row. The BBC's Karishma Vaswani joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison from Jakarta to discuss. Click on the audio player above to hear more.

","type":"text/html"}]
description: Asian markets are down, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it.
contentencoded: Asian markets are down today, and Indonesia is getting the worst of it, dropping 5 percent two days in a row. The BBC's Karishma Vaswani joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison from Jakarta to discuss. Click on the audio player above to hear more.
title: Indonesia markets tumble on Fed fears
